law.catch_line: In or near any building or property used by the Administration for its business, a person may not:...
law.text:
In or near any building or property used by the Administration for its business, a person may not:
Interfere with any person doing business for or with the Administration; or
For a fee charged directly or indirectly, solicit any person:
To assist that person in obtaining a driver's license, certificate of title, vehicle registration, or other license or document; or
To file any statement for that person.
